actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the expansion of the boundaries of the Appomattox Court House National Historical Park, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes expansion of the boundaries of the Appomattox Court House National Historical Park. Authorizes appropriations necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the expansion of the boundaries of the Appomattox Court House National Historical Park, and for other purposes.
